title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Y, ch. IV, pt. 6660 - Long-term Care Ombudsman
content:

§ 6660.1 - Definitions

§ 6660.3 - Conflicts of Interest

§ 6660.5 - Designation of ombudsmen
§ 6660.6 - Designation of local ombudsman entities
§ 6660.7 - Responsibilities of local ombudsman entity coordinators
§ 6660.8 - Program standards for local ombudsman programs
§ 6660.9 - Procedures for ombudsman access to facilities and residents
§ 6660.10 - Procedures for ombudsman access to records

§ 6660.12 - Investigation of Complaints

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Y, ch. IV, pt. 6660

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 19-J
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
